product_name: Marmot Elementalist Soft-Shell Jacket - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The Marmot Elementalist soft-shell jacket uses Gore(R) WindStopper(R) fabric to block wind, resist moisture and remain breathable during active endeavors in moderate to cold weather. WindStopper soft-shell fabric is windproof, highly water resistant and breathable; bonded fleece backing wicks moisture and adds warmth. Weather-exposed areas feature a heavy-duty construction for extra protection, while lightweight underarm panels offer enhanced breathability. Hand pockets are placed for easy access while wearing a pack or harness; includes exterior angled zip chest pocket and an interior zip pocket. Marmot Elementalist soft-shell jacket for men features Angel-Wing Movement(TM) sleeves for full arm motion and to prevent jacket from rising up when arms are raised. Hood with laminated brim and peripheral drawcord; rip-and-stick adjustable cuffs and drawcord hem. Closeout.
short_description: The Marmot Elementalist soft-shell jacket uses Gore(R) WindStopper(R) fabric to block wind, resist moisture and remain breathable during active endeavors in moderate to cold weather.
